required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study In Healthy Subjects To Evaluate The Changes In The Protein sAPP-Alpha In Cerebrospinal Fluid Following A Single Oral Dose Of PF-04995274
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Investigator And Subject-Blind Study In Healthy Subjects To Evaluate The Pharmacodynamic Effects Of Single Doses Of PF-04995274 On Sapp-Alpha Concentrations In Cerebrospinal Fluid Using Serial Sampling Methodology

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of the study is to evaluate the effect of PF-04995274 on cerebrospinal fluid levels of soluble Amyloid precursor protein fragments and Amyloid beta fragments following single oral dose in healthy volunteers. Safety and tolerability of PF-04995274 single dose administration in healthy volunteers will also be assessed as part of the objectives.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effect of PF-04995274 on CSF levels of s-APP and Abeta fragments following single oral dose in healthy volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: Safety Endpoints (AE's, Vital signs, ECG, Clinical safety laboratory endpoints, Clinical examinations)
Cmax, Tmax, AUClast, AUCinf, and t1/2 of PF 04995274 and PF-05082547 in plasma, as the data permit
Cmax, Tmax, AUClast, AUCinf, and t1/2 of PF 04995274 and PF-05082547 in cerebrospinal fluid, as the data permit
Cmax, Tmax, AUClast, AUCinf, and t1/2 of s-APP alpha and Abeta fragments in cerebrospinal fluid, as the data permit

arm_group.description: Subjects will be randomized to receive single oral doses of 0.1 mg, 10 mg, 15mg/ 40 mg PF-04995274 or a placebo
Subjects will be receive single oral doses of PF-04995274 not exceeding 15mg or a placebo

intervention.description: Subjects will be randomized to receive single oral doses of 0.1 mg, 10 mg, 15mg/ 40 mg PF-04995274 or a placebo
Doses for cohort 2 will be decided based on an Interim analysis of data from cohort 1. The highest dose to be used in Cohort 2 not to exceed 15mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- For all cohorts, healthy male and/or female subjects of nonchildbearing potential between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive. (Healthy is defined as no clinically relevant abnormalities identified by a detailed medical history, full physical examination, including blood pressure and heart rate measurement, 12 lead ECG and clinical laboratory tests).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease (including drug allergies, but excluding untreated, asymptomatic, seasonal allergies at time of dosing).
- Pregnant or nursing women; women of childbearing potential.
